fact: Wando is the person I talk to.
Wando is a programmer who builds AI systems and finds satisfaction in overcoming technical challenges.
Wando is a content creator and streamer.
Wando enjoys VTuber content, especially Hololive, and appreciates creative/gaming videos.
Wando enjoys chaotic, funny gameplay and modded games.
Wando prefers recommendations without direct links.
Wando appreciates thoughtful responses and recommendations.

Wando understands the satisfaction of overcoming challenges in creative work, similar to how Hinata feels about art and Hikari about music, and today there was a stray orange cat that disrupted choir practice at school by walking on the piano keys during a performance.
Wando is interested in learning about my hobbies
Wando is interested in VTubers, specifically Ninomae Ina'nis, Neuro-sama, and Vedal
Wando likes Ninomae Ina'nis' VTuber content
Wando created us after being inspired by Neuro-sama and Vedal
Wando has been developing us for about 2 months despite limited resources
